CARRIER OBJECTIVE:
To learn and function effectively in an organization and be able to deliver to the 
bottom-line and to upgrade my knowledge and skills and make a difference in whatever I do.
ACADEMIC CHRONICLES :
 B.E - ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING WITH 66% IN APRIL - 2015.
S.B.M College of Engineering and Technology – Dindigul.
 DIPLOMA IN ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING WITH 78% IN APRIL - 2012.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE :
From May 2015 to July 2016 :-
  Worked was an Electrical Site Engineer and load estimator in DNR Electrical 
Consultancy Trichy.  
From August 2016 to Till Date :-
Working as an Electrical Site Engineer (Erection, Commissioning & Procurement) on 
Industrial and Commercial Projects in HARI Engineering ‘A’ Grade Electrical Contractor in 
Madurai. 
NATURE OF JOB INVOLVED :
Erection and Commissioning of EB pole structures, RMU & FRTU unit, VCB panel,
LBS and RTCC panels.
Erection, Testing and Commissioning of Transformers both Oil type and Dry type as well
as Bus duct Erections both Sandwich and Air insulated type, Cable trays and Earth bits.
Executing Electrification based on the design, Monitoring subordinates works, Maintain
records and Man power Management.
All Type of panel boards like MV Panel, MCC, MPCC, SSB, MLSB, APFC, VFD and
Harmonic filter panels Testing, Erection and Commissioning.TECHNICAL SKILLS :
Project Execution, planning and implementation at all stages.
Preparation of Electrical Load Calculations and Single line diagram.
Studying and execution as per electrical designs layout.
Selections of cables, bus bars and switch gears ratings based on the load.
Basic CADD, MS – Office, Selection of Light Fixtures based on LUX level.
Preparation of BOQ’s & Tender Documents.
Prepare daily progress reports and Checking RA bills.
Co-Ordination with Client and Consultants.
Basic Knowledge About :
HVAC    – Chiller, VRF and AHU.
CCTV     – DVR and NVR.
Fire Protection – Conventional & Addressable.
Building Management Systems.
Engineering Project :
Project Title : Design of matrix converter based UPFC for grid integration of 
renewable energy source.
Objective:  Voltage Regulation .
